paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The source to display in the legend for the CPU data.

paramSchema.title: Process Name Regex
paramSchema.name: processName
paramSchema.description: A regular expression to match the name of the process.

paramSchema.title: Process Path Regex
paramSchema.name: processPath
paramSchema.description: A regular expression to match the full path of the process.

paramSchema.title: Process CWD Regex
paramSchema.name: processCwd
paramSchema.description: A regular expression to match the current working directory of the process.

paramSchema.title: Reconcile option
paramSchema.name: reconcile
paramSchema.description: How to reconcile in the case that multiple processes match.  Set to First Match to use the first matching process, Parent to choose the parent process (useful if process is forked), or Longest Running to pick the process that has been running the longest.
